text:
What annoys me the most is that my home Windows 10 machine that has no TPM and
thus no way to get bitlocker enabled it getting this update. Microsoft come on-
make detection for this smarter. I'm not going to wipe and reload, I'm going to
complain and grumble until someone pulls this sucker and makes detection for
this issue better.
Link: None

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
